definition.procedurexml: <xml xmlns="https://developers.google.com/blockly/xml"><variables><variable type="Number" id="raytrace_y">raytrace_y</variable><variable type="Number" id="raytrace_x">raytrace_x</variable><variable type="Number" id="raytrace_z">raytrace_z</variable></variables><block type="event_trigger" deletable="false" x="40" y="40"><field name="trigger">player_right_click_item</field><next><block type="controls_if"><value name="IF0"><block type="compare_mcitems"><value name="a"><block type="entity_iteminhand"><value name="entity"><block type="entity_from_deps"></block></value></block></value><value name="b"><block type="mcitem_all"><field name="value">CUSTOM:FrogEgg</field></block></value></block></value><statement name="DO0"><block type="controls_if"><comment pinned="false" h="88" w="192">Use this template to place water-type plants on water. Create an item with the texture of your plant, then call this procedure from the "When right clicked in air" trigger</comment><value name="IF0"><block type="logic_binary_ops" inline="false"><field name="OP">AND</field><value name="A"><block type="entity_looking_at_block"><field name="fluid_mode">SOURCE_ONLY</field><field name="block_mode">OUTLINE</field><comment pinned="false" h="80" w="160">We want to make sure that the player is actually looking at a block or fluid source</comment><value name="entity"><block type="entity_from_deps"></block></value><value name="maxdistance"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">5</field></block></value></block></value><value name="B"><block type="logic_negate"><comment pinned="false" h="80" w="160">Players in adventure mode shouldn't be able to place blocks</comment><value name="BOOL"><block type="entity_checkgamemode"><field name="gamemode">ADVENTURE</field><value name="entity"><block type="entity_from_deps"></block></value></block></value></block></value></block></value><statement name="DO0"><block type="variables_set_number"><mutation xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml" is_player_var="false" has_entity="false"></mutation><field name="VAR">local:raytrace_x</field><comment pinned="false" h="80" w="160">These variables will store the clicked position</comment><value name="VAL"><block type="entity_lookpos_x"><field name="fluid_mode">SOURCE_ONLY</field><field name="block_mode">OUTLINE</field><value name="entity"><block type="entity_from_deps"></block></value><value name="maxdistance"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">5</field></block></value></block></value><next><block type="variables_set_number"><mutation xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml" is_player_var="false" has_entity="false"></mutation><field name="VAR">local:raytrace_y</field><value name="VAL"><block type="entity_lookpos_y"><field name="fluid_mode">SOURCE_ONLY</field><field name="block_mode">OUTLINE</field><value name="entity"><block type="entity_from_deps"></block></value><value name="maxdistance"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">5</field></block></value></block></value><next><block type="variables_set_number"><mutation xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml" is_player_var="false" has_entity="false"></mutation><field name="VAR">local:raytrace_z</field><value name="VAL"><block type="entity_lookpos_z"><field name="fluid_mode">SOURCE_ONLY</field><field name="block_mode">OUTLINE</field><value name="entity"><block type="entity_from_deps"></block></value><value name="maxdistance"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">5</field></block></value></block></value><next><block type="controls_if"><value name="IF0"><block type="logic_binary_ops" inline="false"><field name="OP">AND</field><value name="A"><block type="compare_mcblocks"><comment pinned="false" h="80" w="160">This checks for water at the clicked position</comment><value name="a"><block type="world_data_fluidat"><value name="x"><block type="variables_get_number"><mutation xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml" is_player_var="false" has_entity="false"></mutation><field name="VAR">local:raytrace_x</field></block></value><value name="y"><block type="variables_get_number"><mutation xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml" is_player_var="false" has_entity="false"></mutation><field name="VAR">local:raytrace_y</field></block></value><value name="z"><block type="variables_get_number"><mutation xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml" is_player_var="false" has_entity="false"></mutation><field name="VAR">local:raytrace_z</field></block></value></block></value><value name="b"><block type="mcitem_allblocks"><field name="value">Blocks.WATER</field></block></value></block></value><value name="B"><block type="world_data_isair"><comment pinned="false" h="80" w="160">The plant should replace air only</comment><value name="x"><block type="variables_get_number"><mutation xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml" is_player_var="false" has_entity="false"></mutation><field name="VAR">local:raytrace_x</field></block></value><value name="y"><block type="math_dual_ops"><field name="OP">ADD</field><value name="A"><block type="variables_get_number"><mutation name="NUM">1</field></block></value></block></value><value name="z"><block type="variables_get_number"><mutation xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml" is_player_var="false" has_entity="false"></mutation><field name="VAR">local:raytrace_z</field></block></value></block></value></block></value><statement name="DO0"><block type="block_add"><value name="block"><block type="mcitem_allblocks"><field name="value">CUSTOM:FrogEgg</field><comment pinned="false" h="80" w="160">You can replace this with your water-type plant</comment></block></value><value name="x"><block name="NUM">1</field></block></value></block></next></block></next></block></statement></block></next></block></next></block></next></block></statement></block></statement></block></next></block></xml>
